Loss Description: Water Damage due to Plumbing System: Water from the shower leaked into the conco below.
AI Loss Cause: water damage due to Plumbing System
AI Triage Reasoning: Water damage to the unit below from plumbing linked to the insureds bathroom.
AI Reasoning: Claim appears to be for dwelling damage to the unit below from a leak in the plumbing.  Coverage for repairing plumbing is excluded as this is either in the wall and the HOA responsibility, or it is normal wear & tear/faulty maintenance resulting in a leak.  Damage to the unit below is not covered by the HO6 policy as it is not part of the residence premises.

Loss Description: Water Damage: Johnson have a leak between family and bathroom wall from hot water pipe
AI Loss Cause: water damage due to Plumbing System
AI Triage Reasoning: Water Pipe leaking resulting dwelling damages.
AI Reasoning: Coverage is afforded up to the limits for Coverage A and Coverage C for ensuing water damage.  Repair to pipe would be excluded.

Loss Description: Water Damage: Chretien noticed water, moisture, and mold in the attic, bedroom and living room ceiling water stains
AI Damaged Items:
attic
bedroom ceiling
living room ceiling
AI Triage Reasoning: Mold damage in the attic and on ceilings in the main house.
AI Reasoning: Coverage is afforded up to the limits of the limited Limited Fungi, Wet or Dry Rot, or Bacteria Coverage – Massachusetts.  The mold damage to the attic can be covered as it is above ceilings of a structure and likely unknown to the insured. Mold present on the ceiling is visible and would not be covered.  A partial denial would be required in this case.

Loss Description: Water Damage: Rain heavy last few months three areas leaking heavily each time- worse with each rain - rains now have mold on ceilings .
AI Triage Reasoning: Heavy rain is causing damage to the interior of the home.
AI Reasoning: Coverage would be excluded in this case.  The insured's roof is leaking likely due to age, wear & tear, and has not been repaird so maintenance is an issue as well.  If the insured or an inspection can demonstrate a storm created opening, coverage may be afforded in that case.

AI Triage Reasoning: broken pipe to boiler causing water damage in the basement.

Loss Description: Water Damage: During the heavy wind and rains, water was pouring in the bedroom from the ceiling.

AI Reasoning: Water damage as a result of damage to or around the chimney.  No sudden or accidental damage to chimney or flashing described so ensuing water damage will also be denied coverage.
